lines.text: You want some champaign?
I can do without the "cham", just give me the pain...
I'm like King Midas - everything I touch turns to poontang!
Hound dogs gonna eat that pussy!
Roses are red, violets are blue, ya got big tits, I wanna suck on em' too!
I got a problem with my pecker.
Damn... all dressed up and no place to go.

[In whorehouse when first seeing Pondo]
He's got a face only a cockroach could love.

[with heavy Brooklyn accent]
I'd ratha fuck my fawtha.

[Inside sex shop, holding up giant double-dong]
What's this for?
Twins.
I WANT the M5!
My God, I'm purple.
from interstellar communications to ze development of a functioning aphrodisiac. Now, let us first look...

[raising his hand and interrupting the professor]
Uh, Professor Schmidt
Ja, Herr Sinatra
What is an aphrodisiac?
Ze word aphrodisiac comes from ze African root
[writing on the chalkboard]
'APHRO' meaning large penis, und ze Greek 'DISIAC' which means want it bad.
Why ya think we call pussy, 'pussy'?
Why I don't know sir.
'Cause it's furry? Nah. 'Cause it's warm. Uh-uh. 'Cause it scratch when it gets angry? Nah. Well what, den? Now it don't purr, and it don't meOOOOW. Then why do we call it 'pussy'?
I don't know sir.
hound dog's gonna eat that pussy!
